description: Erweiterung von EDS Lite zu einer dezentralen WebRTC-Plattform für sichere Kommunikation und Dateiaustausch.
tasks: Collect and analyze ANR/FATAL logs from device to pinpoint actual freeze/crash cause (enable filtered logcat + timestamps).

Audit and document all automatic signaling connections (WebSocketSignalingClient connect/reconnect, SignalingWorker HTTP polling, LocalSignalingClient discovery) and confirm they never trigger peer connections.
Review any remaining auto-initiated peer connection paths (FCM signaling offers/answers, app startup flows) to ensure handshake gating is enforced everywhere.
Add a lightweight debug screen/log entry listing recent connection attempts (request/accept/offer) to help verify no silent auto-connects in the field.
architecture_goals: Vollständige Dezentralität (kein zentraler Server außer Signaling/STUN)
